      • getZipEntryAsString

        public static String getZipEntryAsString(File zipFile,
                                         String zipEntry)
        Extracts a file (not directory) from a specified zip archive.
        Parameters:
        zipFile - an archive file to extract the specified entry
        zipEntry - a string than represents a zip entry relative to the root of zipFile. For example? if a zip file is a war archive then "WEB-INF/jetty-web.xml".
        Returns:
        a string representation of the extracted zip entry
